languages.text: {n}Уже знакомый шелест вековых крон и едва заметное движение на краю зрения оповещают Вольного Торговца о том, что леса вновь пришли в движение — бегут ли они от далеко пылающих пожаров или просто мигрируют? Сложно сказать. Однако на месте просторных полян теперь плотный лес, а тропы вновь сменили свои направления.{/n}

{n}The now familiar rustle of the centuries-old canopy and barely perceptible movement at the edge of the Rogue Trader's vision announce that the forests are once again in motion — are they fleeing the distant raging fires or simply migrating? It is difficult to say. However, spacious meadows have now been replaced with dense forest, and the trails have changed direction once more.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Уже знакомый шелест вековых крон и едва заметное движение на краю зрения оповещают Вольного Торговца о том, что леса вновь пришли в движение — бегут ли они от далеко пылающих пожаров или просто мигрируют? Сложно сказать. Однако на месте просторных полян теперь плотный лес, а тропы вновь сменили свои направления.{/n}

It is difficult to say. However, spacious meadows have now been replaced with dense forest, and the trails have changed direction once more.{/n}

It is difficult to say. However, spacious meadows have now been replaced with dense forest, and the trails have changed direction once more.{/n}

It is difficult to say. However, spacious meadows have now been replaced with dense forest, and the trails have changed direction once more.{/n}

It is difficult to say. However, spacious meadows have now been replaced with dense forest, and the trails have changed direction once more.{/n}

languages.text: {n}古老的树冠发出了沙沙声。在行商浪人的视野边缘，这座森林再次开始移动。那些树木究竟是在躲避远方的熊熊大火，还是仅仅是在迁徙而已？没人知道答案。不过，原本广阔的草场再次被茂密的森林覆盖，森林中的小径也再次改变了方向。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The now familiar rustle of the centuries-old canopy and barely perceptible movement at the edge of the Rogue Trader's vision announce that the forests are once again in motion — are they fleeing the distant raging fires or simply migrating? It is difficult to say. However, spacious meadows have now been replaced with dense forest, and the trails have changed direction once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}古老的树冠发出了沙沙声。在行商浪人的视野边缘，这座森林再次开始移动。那些树木究竟是在躲避远方的熊熊大火，还是仅仅是在迁徙而已？没人知道答案。不过，原本广阔的草场再次被茂密的森林覆盖，森林中的小径也再次改变了方向。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le bruissement désormais familier de la canopée séculaire, accompagné de mouvements tout juste perceptibles à l'œil nu, annonce que les forêts se sont remises en mouvement. Seraient-elles en train de fuir les incendies ? Ou s'agirait-il d'une simple migration ? Difficile à dire. Quoi qu'il en soit, ce qui était auparavant une vaste prairie a été remplacé par une forêt dense, et les pistes ont de nouveau changé de direction.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The now familiar rustle of the centuries-old canopy and barely perceptible movement at the edge of the Rogue Trader's vision announce that the forests are once again in motion — are they fleeing the distant raging fires or simply migrating? It is difficult to say. However, spacious meadows have now been replaced with dense forest, and the trails have changed direction once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le bruissement désormais familier de la canopée séculaire, accompagné de mouvements tout juste perceptibles à l'œil nu, annonce que les forêts se sont remises en mouvement. Seraient-elles en train de fuir les incendies ? Ou s'agirait-il d'une simple migration ? Difficile à dire. Quoi qu'il en soit, ce qui était auparavant une vaste prairie a été remplacé par une forêt dense, et les pistes ont de nouveau changé de direction.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El ya familiar crepitar de la centenaria hojarasca y el casi imperceptible movimiento en el rabillo del ojo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente anuncian que el bosque vuelve a moverse. ¿Está huyendo del lejano incendio o es solo una migración? Es difícil saberlo. Sin embargo, los amplios prados han dado paso a un denso bosque y los caminos vuelven a haber cambiado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The now familiar rustle of the centuries-old canopy and barely perceptible movement at the edge of the Rogue Trader's vision announce that the forests are once again in motion — are they fleeing the distant raging fires or simply migrating? It is difficult to say. However, spacious meadows have now been replaced with dense forest, and the trails have changed direction once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El ya familiar crepitar de la centenaria hojarasca y el casi imperceptible movimiento en el rabillo del ojo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente anuncian que el bosque vuelve a moverse. ¿Está huyendo del lejano incendio o es solo una migración? Es difícil saberlo. Sin embargo, los amplios prados han dado paso a un denso bosque y los caminos vuelven a haber cambiado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}今や聞き慣れた数世紀を経た森の天井がカサカサと鳴る音と、自由開拓者の視界の端にかすかに見えた動きが、再び森が動き出したことを告げるーー遠くで燃え盛る炎から逃げているのか、それとも単に移動しているのだろうか？判別し難い。しかし、広々とした草地は今や鬱蒼とした森に変わり、小道は再びその方向を変えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The now familiar rustle of the centuries-old canopy and barely perceptible movement at the edge of the Rogue Trader's vision announce that the forests are once again in motion — are they fleeing the distant raging fires or simply migrating? It is difficult to say. However, spacious meadows have now been replaced with dense forest, and the trails have changed direction once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}今や聞き慣れた数世紀を経た森の天井がカサカサと鳴る音と、自由開拓者の視界の端にかすかに見えた動きが、再び森が動き出したことを告げるーー遠くで燃え盛る炎から逃げているのか、それとも単に移動しているのだろうか？判別し難い。しかし、広々とした草地は今や鬱蒼とした森に変わり、小道は再びその方向を変えた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das inzwischen schon vertraute Rascheln des jahrhundertealten Blattwerks und die kaum wahrnehmbaren Bewegungen im Augenwinkel {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} verkünden, dass die Wälder erneut in Bewegung sind. Fliehen sie vor den tosenden Feuern in der Ferne oder migrieren sie nur? Es ist schwer zu sagen. Aber weitläufige Wiesen wurden durch dichten Wald ersetzt, und die Wege haben wieder die Richtung geändert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The now familiar rustle of the centuries-old canopy and barely perceptible movement at the edge of the Rogue Trader's vision announce that the forests are once again in motion — are they fleeing the distant raging fires or simply migrating? It is difficult to say. However, spacious meadows have now been replaced with dense forest, and the trails have changed direction once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das inzwischen schon vertraute Rascheln des jahrhundertealten Blattwerks und die kaum wahrnehmbaren Bewegungen im Augenwinkel {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} verkünden, dass die Wälder erneut in Bewegung sind. Fliehen sie vor den tosenden Feuern in der Ferne oder migrieren sie nur? Es ist schwer zu sagen. Aber weitläufige Wiesen wurden durch dichten Wald ersetzt, und die Wege haben wieder die Richtung geändert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yüzlerce yıllık tentenin kulağa artık aşina gelen hışırtısı ve Hür Tacir'in göz ucuyla gördüğü güç bela algılanan hareketler, ormanın bir kez daha hareket hâlinde olduğunun habercisi. Orman, uzaklardaki hiddetli alevlerden mi kaçıyor yoksa yalnızca göç mü ediyor? Söylemesi zor. Engin çayırların yerini artık yoğun bir orman almış ve patikalar da bir kez daha yön değiştirmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The now familiar rustle of the centuries-old canopy and barely perceptible movement at the edge of the Rogue Trader's vision announce that the forests are once again in motion — are they fleeing the distant raging fires or simply migrating? It is difficult to say. However, spacious meadows have now been replaced with dense forest, and the trails have changed direction once more.{/n}
